name: Constance Van Berckel
skills: ['Branding', 'Marketing', 'Online Marketing', 'Event Planning', 'Writing', 'Research', 'Art History', 'Art Gallery', 'Contemporary Art', 'Organization Skills', 'Teamwork', 'Modern Art', 'Social Media', 'InDesign', 'Public Speaking', 'Photoshop', 'Sales', 'Microsoft Office', 'Microsoft Word', 'Microsoft Excel']
summary:
Constance van Berckel is an independent curator, event organizer and entrepreneur. She is active in the international art scene, having worked in Los Angeles, Berlin, London and Amsterdam. She has extensive experience on the commercial side of the industry, as well as on the more experimental and conceptual side of the art scene. 

In 2017 she founded Art Tours Berlin (www.arttoursberlin.com), an art tours and events company through which she organized a great number of art tours, events, talks and panel discussions. The company grew to 10 employees, with a strong presence in both the Berlin and London art scenes. Art Tours Berlin was passed on to new directors in 2020, and it continues to flourish. 
She then founded AXS ART (www.axs-art.com) in 2018, an online gallery for art by emerging artists, aimed at starting collectors. The goal of AXS ART is to provide greater access to art collecting, by bringing young art buyers and artists together via its e-commerce platform and Instagram, as well as through regular pop-up exhibitions.

Most recently, she organized the exhibition with an elaborate events programme titled ‘unity | duality | trinity’ at De School in Amsterdam. She is currently working on various projects as a curator and event program organizer. Furthermore, she is working on founding a digital artist residency that is scheduled to launch in the spring of 2023.

The projects she has led lie on the intersection of art and digital technology, presenting art in an interdisciplinary context, where the viewer/visitor is invited to explore how we as humans connect to each other and the world around us. 
Constance consistently aims to extend the access to art and the art world to a wider, more diverse audience, and create environments that are connecting and unifying in nature.

name: Bibi Queisen

summary:
Hi, I'm Bibi and I'm currently part of the program department of Go Short - International Short Film Festival Nijmegen! My specialisation within film is animation.

I graduated from Radboud University Nijmegen in the summer of 2021 with a Master of Arts degree in Arts Policy and Cultural Management. I also have a Bachelor of Arts in Arts History with a specialisation in 20th-century American Art. 

Shoot me a message if you wish!

name: Arthur Steiner
summary:
Arthur Steiner is an art historian passionate about the role of the arts and digital tech in tackling 21st century challenges. Throughout his working life he has set up various initiatives at the intersection of Digital Rights, Contemporary Art and Climate Justice.

Most recently he worked at Hivos, where he was in charge of the global grantmaking program on arts and culture. During these years he was deeply involved in cultural sector building in North Africa, West Asia and East Africa. He set up Digital Earth, a research fellowship that provides support for artists and designers as they explore questions related to digital futures. It included an educational trajectory, a decentralized residency program, exhibitions and public programs around the world.

Arthur is editor at Vertical Atlas, a new atlas to help us navigate the digital geopolitics of the world today. He curated curated art exhibitions and events with institutions Het Nieuwe Instituut, Ashkal Alwan, Ker Thiossane, Jameel Arts Centre, Chronus Art Center, Strelka Institute and The Centre Pompidou

name: Yoorim Park
field of studies 1: Global Archaeology, Heritage and Museum Studies

summary:
Bridging people by promoting the products of culture

With the background in Art & Culture, I have been organising many educational events in museums and carried out multiple curatorial researches on artefacts and collections. Based on this experience, I am now working as an event marketeer to bridge the products I love and the people who would need them. Bringing different cultures and people together has always been my passion and interest!
